page.title: 03COMMUNICATIONS BILLINGSHURST
page.content: THE AREA COVERED BY THE SURVEY IS SERVED BY ONE UNMANNED STROWGER AUTOMATIC TELEPHONE EXCHANGE, PARENTED ON HORSHAM FOR NATIONAL,INTERNATIONAL AND ASSISTANCE CALLS. PREVIOUSLY THE AREA WAS SERVED BY A MANUAL EXCHANGE HOUSED ABOVE THE POST OFFICE. THERE WAS PROVISION FOR 6OO LINES, OF WHICH ABOUT 4OO WERE USED. THE PRESENT BUILDING OFF MILL WAY, WAS OPENED ON 6 MARCH 1963, AND WAS EXTENDED IN THE 197Os. 28OO TELEPHONE LINES ARE WORKING TODAY,SERVICED BY ONE TECHNICAL OFFICER WITH ONE T2A FOR CUSTOMER APPARATUS AND LINE MAINTENANCE
